title: Abubakar Aliyu Ibrahim
text:
Abubakar Aliyu Ibrahim (born 18 November 1994) is a Nigerian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player, who plays for <a href="Klaksv%C3%ADkar%20%C3%8Dtr%C3%B3ttarfelag">KÍ Klaksvíkar</a>.
Career.
Aliyu went on trial with <a href="IK%20Start">IK Start</a> in February 2017, eventually signing permanently with the club.
He was loaned out to <a href="Hamarkameratene">HamKam</a> on 12 March 2018 for the rest of the season. He signed permanently with the club on 16 August 2018.
